title: Expose Super Admin Login entry on Shop Login screen

requirements.summary: Add a clearly visible "Super Admin Login" control on the Shop Login screen that navigates to /auth/admin/login without affecting existing shop auth actions.
acceptanceCriteria: On "/auth/shop/login", a clearly visible control labeled "Super Admin Login" is present without needing to scroll.
Activating "Super Admin Login" navigates to "/auth/admin/login" and renders the existing AdminLoginPage.
Existing Shop Login and Create New Shop Account actions continue to work as before.

file_operations.description: Add a prominent navigation control labeled "Super Admin Login" (e.g., an additional Button in the existing CardContent) that uses the existing TanStack Router navigate() to route to "/auth/admin/login"; keep all user-facing text in English and do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
